trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_SEQ_00<tab>Nigen is worried about yet another family member.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_TODO_00<tab>Find Nigen's sister and slay any enemies that appear.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_000<tab>Allow me to thank you once again for helping my brother. Would you be able to aid my sister as well? Our family is somewhat troubled...
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_001<tab>The gods told her to go and gather water from the river to the west. However, many beasts lurk in the area. I worry she will be set upon as my brother was.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_002<tab>Yet again I am unable to accompany her as the elder gods have given me my own work.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_003<tab>Could I ask you to check on her in my stead? She should still be gathering water to the west.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_004<tab>Please check on my sister in my stead. She should still be gathering water to the west.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_YOUNGNIGEN_000_010<tab>Thank you so much, kind stranger. I am in your debt.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_YOUNGNIGEN_000_011<tab>Tell me, have you heard of this river before? Its water is said to have healing properties─one drink and all your ailments shall be gone!
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_YOUNGNIGEN_000_012<tab>I imagine that someone in the village is going to fall sick shortly. That is surely why the gods bid me to gather water from the river.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_020<tab>Did you find my sister? She is still yet to return.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_030<tab>Thank you for your help. My sister is returned at last.
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_031<tab>It seems you have influenced my siblings quite profoundly. They too have decided to become adventurers!
TEXT_STMBDZ517_02768_NIGEN_000_032<tab>No doubt the elder gods foresaw this when they sent them out on their errands. I am most excited to hear of their adventures in the future.
